question:
[Kent] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Kecia]. [Sharon] was eager to spend time with her son, [Rick]. [Rick] and his son [Kent] went to look at cars. [Rick] ended up buying the Mustang. [Brian] went to the Farmer's market with his mother [Sharon] and his brother [Davis]. [James] and his daughter [Kecia] took a day off school to go to the zoo.
Question: How is [Davis] related to [James]?

teacher_log.content:
You are a knowledgeable and patient professor whose role is to guide students in solving problems correctly.
Here is a question:
[Kent] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Kecia]. [Sharon] was eager to spend time with her son, [Rick]. [Rick] and his son [Kent] went to look at cars. [Rick] ended up buying the Mustang. [Brian] went to the Farmer's market with his mother [Sharon] and his brother [Davis]. [James] and his daughter [Kecia] took a day off school to go to the zoo.
Question: How is [Davis] related to [James]?
Task:
The question contains a large set of semi-synthetic stories involving hypothetical families. 
The task is to infer the relationship between two family members, whose relationship is not explicitly mentioned in the given story.
please provide a detailed analysis.
Note: Since your responsibility is to guide students in answering the question, your analysis should think step by step, 
Please note that your role is to guide them step by step through the problem, so please don't give them the final result

Step 1: Identify the family members mentioned in the story
- [Kent] and [Kecia] are siblings
- [Sharon] is the mother of [Rick] and [Brian]
- [Rick] is the son of [Sharon] and the father of [Kent]
- [Brian] is the son of [Sharon] and the brother of [Davis]
- [James] is the father of [Kecia]

Step 2: Identify the relationship between [Davis] and [James]
- [Davis] is the son of [Sharon], making him the brother of [Rick] and [Brian]
- [Kecia] is the daughter of [James], making [Davis] the grandson of [James]

Step 3: Determine the relationship between [Davis] and [James]
- [Davis] is the grandson of [James]

So, based on the information provided, [Davis] is the grandson of [James].
